_metadata.description: 8px sub-grid collision system for 32px tiles with partial-tile transparency support

alphaThreshold.description: Alpha threshold (0-255) for determining if a pixel is considered opaque. Pixels with alpha >= threshold are solid.
alphaThreshold.usage: When Agent 3 identifies transparent-but-solid pixels, only pixels passing alpha_threshold_passed are marked as collidable

value.alpha_threshold_passed: Boolean indicating if this tile was processed with alpha threshold detection
value.description: Each entry represents one tile's collision data

format.maskBits: Each bit represents one 8px sub-cell: bit 0 = top-left, bit 15 = bottom-right

maskValues.0x0001-0xFFFE: Partial collision (only specific sub-cells are solid, reflecting opaque pixels only)

_metadata.sync: This file is synced with COLOR_MANIFEST.js collision logic via getTileCollision() function. Agent 3 can dynamically update bitmasks to reflect only opaque pixels based on alpha threshold detection.
_metadata.persistence: Tight boundaries are persisted to prevent detective from bouncing off invisible transparent pixels after reload
